Projects

Azure VM Ops

This project demonstrates foundational Azure administration skills through the deployment and management of a Windows virtual machine in Microsoft Azure. This lab focuses on core operational tasks including resource organization, virtual networking, network security group configuration, controlled remote access, and cost awareness. This project was completed as a personal hands-on lab to reinforce my understanding of AZ-104 concepts and basic Azure operational workflows.

View the Code on GitHub

Azure IAM Fundamentals

This project demonstrates foundational identity and access management in Microsoft Azure using Microsoft Entra ID. This lab focuses on user and group creation, group-based role assignments, role-based access control (RBAC), and least privilege principles applied at the resource group scope. This project was completed as a hands-on lab to reinforce my understanding of Azure administration and security fundamentals aligned with AZ-104.

View the Code on GitHub

Azure Storage & Backup Ops

This project demonstrates foundational Azure storage operations using Azure Blob Storage. The lab focuses on storage account provisioning, private blob container management, basic data operations, and data protection through soft delete. The project reinforces Azure storage and operational fundamentals aligned with AZ-104.
